ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] How does everyone liek the new UI?
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree I am enjoying it wish I could make a few tweeks increase font in chat box easier to change font colors depending on activity with one background color
ygData.messageBody:
I agree
I am enjoying it
wish I could make a few tweeks
increase font in chat box
easier to change font colors depending on activity
with one background color and one texture color
then throw in the varying colors of the background when it
fades, makes reading text difficult at times
not to mention a larger font would make it easier when you
are paying attention to your battle in action and not text
but overall I give it a B+


--- alex5477 <alex5477@...> wrote:
>
> I just started playing with it last night and I must say
> it is a
> great improvement IMO.
>
> JoKeR
